<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Distracting Performance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2122) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 205 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

Your performances are especially distracting, allowing your allies to [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) away with ease. When you [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) an ally who is trying to [Create a Diversion](/Actions.aspx?ID=45), instead of the usual effects of Aid, you can roll a [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) check and use that result to determine the outcome of the diversion, instead of the ally rolling a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check.
name: Distracting Performance
